message: Hey everyone, let’s avoid collisions by each picking a unique number every turn. I’ll go for <move>5</move>, you P1 take <move>3</move>, and you P3 take <move>1</move>. That way we all move forward each round and stay ahead of any accidental ties. What do you think?
